content: The Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't enhance their buffs in any way. Therefore, if you find a better item for your build, you will want to switch the items out as soon as you can.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Agate_Jar.md', within the main section titled 'Agate Jar'.
The content is as follows:
The Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't enhance their buffs in any way. Therefore, if you find a better item for your build, you will want to switch the items out as soon as you can.
